name: Food Knight
description:
You are a Food Knight sent to gather food for the king's feast! You must traverse the Food realm in search of ingredients for the king's many meals.

  •  Use your magical cleaver to chop up those Food creatures to harvest the ingredients
  • Combine 2 ingredients to create a meal!
  • Make enough meals to satisfy the king.

This is my first independent game I made in about a month. I hope you enjoy.

Music:

"Overworld" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
